content: TE-Y CC Concrete channel chisels SDS Max (TE-Y) concrete channel chisel for cutting and gouging channels in concrete ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Upgraded breaking power – extra-tough connection end transfers more force from the tool to the chisel Better reliability – these chisel bits are made from high-alloy steel, essential when you need consistency and reliability Built for tough jobs – tested for extreme use, our channel chisels are made to power through your most demanding demolition work Certified quality – developed using ISO certified processes and more than 30 years of expertise in chisel design and production Applications Creating channels in concrete for recessed conduits For use with SDS Max (TE-Y) electric jackhammers, breakers or rotary hammers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-Y (SDS Max) Application: Channeling Product Class: Premium Technical Data | Connection end | TE-Y (SDS Max) | Application | Channeling | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2429008 - Concrete channel chisel TE-Y CC 28/2.8 - Package Size 1 pc
